text: Paulino Martínez (born 31 August 1952) is a former Spanish racing cyclist. He rode in four Grand Tours between 1978 and 1981. He also competed in the road race event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Burgos Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain
title: Paulino Martínez
